EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed: February 10-11
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the two-day workshop on Migrating a Monolith Application to Microservices. See event details below.
Date: 10-11 February 2016 Time: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Location: VMware, Level 8, 175 Pitt St, Sydney
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website.
